# Test: grove add shows warning for invalid TOML config
setup_workspace

cp $WORK/grove-invalid.toml .grove.toml

exec grove add feature/invalid-toml
stderr 'Created worktree at .*[/\\]feature-invalid-toml'
stderr 'hooks disabled'
exists ../feature-invalid-toml

-- grove-invalid.toml --
this is not valid toml [[[
